itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by comedians and hosts of the Giggle Boys podcast Eli Halpern and Mike Eaton to talk about their show, Mattel’s new Helen Keller Barbie, the statement from the QAnon Shaman’s lawyer that is currently going viral, the time Mike pissed off Kobe Bryant, and smuggling heroin into prison.
